taskDescription: p-Dimethoxytrityl (DMT) ethers are easily cleaved by mild acid treatment. Show the mechanism of the cleavage reaction.
detailedSolution: The cleavage is an SN1 reaction that occurs by protonation of the oxygen atom followed by loss of the stable triarylmethyl carbocation.
